summary: This is a forwarded email from September 22, 2021, discussing forensic observations related to Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email describes photos showing an electric cord on the inside and outside of a cell door, states the cord was handled, and argues that the undisturbed state of items on a top bunk indicates no one jumped from it.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email discussing forensic details related to Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Forensic Analysis of Epstein's Death Scene
events.description: An email describes forensic observations from photos of Jeffrey Epstein's cell, including an electric cord on the inside and outside of the door, that the cord was handled, and that items on a top bunk were undisturbed, arguing against a jump from the bunk.

keyFacts: Photos of Jeffrey Epstein's cell show an electric cord on both the inside and outside of the cell door.
The electric cord was reportedly handled.
The email argues that items on a top bunk were undisturbed, indicating no one jumped from it.
The correspondence is dated September 22, 2021, well after Epstein's 2019 death, suggesting ongoing analysis or discussion of the case.
